#summary Downloading the SAML Bridge for Windows in Google Search Appliance Connector
#labels Phase-Deploy
*Downloading the SAML Bridge for Windows in Google Search Appliance Connector*

For customers who qualify for enterprise-level support, Google
provides support for the Google Search Appliance Connectors. You can
go to the [http://www.google.com/enterprise/portal Enterprise Support Portal]
to download supported versions of the SAML Bridge for Windows or contact Google Enterprise 
Support.

To download installers for the Google Search Appliance Connectors, see the
[https://drive.google.com/folderview?id=0B8wJWld5GWGYVlpvSTB1RUF5dzg&usp=sharing&tid=0B8wJWld5GWGYcnNUSTlvSTBwekU#list installers folder] on Google Drive. For earlier versions, see the [https://code.google.com/p/googlesearchapplianceconnectors/downloads/list Downloads] page on the [https://code.google.com/p/googlesearchapplianceconnectors/ installers code site].

For unsupported builds, early access, or to download supported patches
as directed by Google Enterprise Support, see the [http://code.google.com/p/google-saml-bridge-for-windows/downloads/list Downloads] page on this code site.

Google may not provide support for builds downloaded from the code sites.
